review: The stick is not so great but good enough for its price. I have problems with buffering in the midst of watching a show or a movie and sometime problems with pixels. I have a high speed internet from Comcast and the Firestick is literally a couple of feet away from my router and I still have issues with this device. Youre better off buying a Neotv for $25.00 bucks! Plus the Firestick doesnt have VUDU which sucks too!

review: I purchased the Amazon Fire TV Stick when it came out the first time. I loved it so much and I am still now. The stream quality is good and I am able to get it running in a small amount of time. No hassle.Recently, I brought the stick during our vacation so my kids can still see their favorite cartoon shows. Surprisingly, it works great! I am able to connect to the hotel's wifi and get the channel that my kids wanted.I truly recommend this product.
